segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems completely engrossed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water, oh the water, is just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a rapidly expanding puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in it, which is baffling to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such an obvious disaster unfolding?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water streaming down the cabinet doors; it must be causing damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s no plug in sight, so it just keeps running, relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water is truly astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the soft splash as it hits the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is making me feel quite uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a mess that could have been easily avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take her to finally notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm of her face is in stark contrast to the chaos below.
segments.speaker: PAR
